CellValue_English: The accounting policies set out in this template are included merely for illustrative purposes and should not be considered applicable to any specific case. Accounting policies should be drafted on a case by case basis so as to fully explain the specific significant policies applied.

Rekeningkundige beleid moet op ‘n geval-tot-geval-basis opgestel word om die spesifieke, tersaaklike beleide wat toegepas is, volledig toe te lig.

CellValue_English: The financial statements of IFRS+AFRIKAANS have been prepared in accordance with IFRS Accounting Standards as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board and the Companies Act of South Africa. The financial statements have been prepared under the historical cost convention, as modified by the revaluation of land and buildings, available-for-sale financial assets, and financial assets and financial liabilities (including derivative instruments) at fair value through profit or loss.
CellFormula_English: 'The financial statements of IFRS+AFRIKAANS have been prepared in accordance with IFRS Accounting Standards as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board and the Companies Act of South Africa. The financial statements have been prepared under the historical cost convention, as modified by the revaluation of land and buildings, available-for-sale financial assets, and financial assets and financial liabilities (including derivative instruments) at fair value through profit or loss.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Die finansiële state van IFRS+AFRIKAANS is opgestel in ooreenstemming met die IFRS-Rekeningkundige Standaarde soos uitgereik deur die International Accounting Standards Board en die Maatskappyewet van Suid-Afrika. Die finansiële state is opgestel volgens die historiese koste-konvensie, soos gewysig deur die herevaluasie van grond en geboue, beskikbaar-vir-verkoop-finansiële bates, en finansiële bates en finansiële laste (insluitend afgeleide instrumente) teen billike waarde deur wins of verlies.

Die finansiële state is opgestel volgens die historiese koste-konvensie, soos gewysig deur die herevaluasie van grond en geboue, beskikbaar-vir-verkoop-finansiële bates, en finansiële bates en finansiële laste (insluitend afgeleide instrumente) teen billike waarde deur wins of verlies.

CellValue_English: The preparation of financial statements in conformity with IFRS Accounting Standards as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board requires the use of certain critical accounting estimates. It also requires management to exercise its judgement in the process of applying the company's accounting policies. The areas involving a higher degree of judgement or complexity, or areas where assumptions and estimates are significant to the financial statements are disclosed in note 3.
CellFormula_English: 'The preparation of financial statements in conformity with IFRS Accounting Standards as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board requires the use of certain critical accounting estimates. It also requires management to exercise its judgement in the process of applying the company's accounting policies. The areas involving a higher degree of judgement or complexity, or areas where assumptions and estimates are significant to the financial statements are disclosed in note 3.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Die opstelling van finansiële state in ooreenstemming met die IFRS Rekeningkundige Standaarde soos uitgereik deur die International Accounting Standards Board vereis die gebruik van sekere kritiese rekeningkundige beramings. Dit vereis ook van bestuur om sy oordeel toe te pas in die proses van toepassing van die maatskappy se rekeningkundige beleide. Die areas wat 'n hoër mate van oordeel of kompleksiteit behels, of areas waar aannames en beramings wesenlik is vir die finansiële state, word in nota 3 openbaar gemaak.

Dit vereis ook van bestuur om sy oordeel toe te pas in die proses van toepassing van die maatskappy se rekeningkundige beleide. Die areas wat 'n hoër mate van oordeel of kompleksiteit behels, of areas waar aannames en beramings wesenlik is vir die finansiële state, word in nota 3 openbaar gemaak.

CellValue_English: Subsidiaries are all entities (including structured entities) over which the company has control. The company controls an entity when the company is exposed to, or has rights to, variable returns from its involvement with the entity and has the ability to affect those returns through its power over the entity. Subsidiaries are fully consolidated from the date on which control is transferred to the company. They are deconsolidated from the date that control ceases.
CellFormula_English: 'Subsidiaries are all entities (including structured entities) over which the company has control. The company controls an entity when the company is exposed to, or has rights to, variable returns from its involvement with the entity and has the ability to affect those returns through its power over the entity. Subsidiaries are fully consolidated from the date on which control is transferred to the company. They are deconsolidated from the date that control ceases.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Filiale is alle entiteite (insluitend gestruktureerde entiteite) waaroor die maatskappy beheer uitoefen. Die maatskappy het beheer oor ’n entiteit wanneer die maatskappy blootgestel is aan, of regte het op, veranderlike opbrengste uit sy betrokkenheid by die entiteit en oor die vermoë beskik om daardie opbrengste te beïnvloed deur sy mag oor die entiteit. Filiale word volledig gekonsolideer vanaf die datum waarop beheer na die maatskappy oorgedra word. Hulle word gedekonsolideer vanaf die datum waarop beheer ophou.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Filiale is alle entiteite (insluitend gestruktureerde entiteite) waaroor die maatskappy beheer uitoefen. Die maatskappy het beheer oor ’n entiteit wanneer die maatskappy blootgestel is aan, of regte het op, veranderlike opbrengste uit sy betrokkenheid by die entiteit en oor die vermoë beskik om daardie opbrengste te beïnvloed deur sy mag oor die entiteit. Filiale word volledig gekonsolideer vanaf die datum waarop beheer na die maatskappy oorgedra word. Hulle word gedekonsolideer vanaf die datum waarop beheer ophou.

CellValue_English: The company applies the acquisition method to account for business combinations. The consideration transferred for the acquisition of a subsidiary is the fair values of the assets transferred, the liabilities incurred to the former owners of the acquiree and the equity interests issued by the company. The consideration transferred includes the fair value of any asset or liability resulting from a contingent consideration arrangement. Identifiable assets acquired and liabilities and contingent liabilities assumed in a business combination are measured initially at their fair values at the acquisition date. The company recognises any non-controlling interest in the acquiree on an acquisition-by-acquisition basis, either at fair value or at the non-controlling interest's proportionate share of the recognised amounts of acquiree's identifiable net assets.
CellFormula_English: '="Basis of preparation and "&AccPolicies_IFRS_Name
CellValue_Afrikaans: Die maatskappy pas die verkrygingsmetode toe om besigheidskombinasies te verreken. Die teenprestasie oorgedra vir die verkryging van ’n filiaal is die billike waarde van die bates wat oorgedra is, die laste wat teenoor die vorige eienaars van die verkryde onderneming aangegaan is, en die aandelebelange wat deur die maatskappy uitgereik is. Die oorgedraaide teenprestasie sluit die billike waarde in van enige bate of las wat uit ’n voorwaardelike teenprestasie-reëling spruit. Identifiseerbare bates wat verkry is, en laste en voorwaardelike laste wat by ’n besigheidskombinasie oorgeneem is, word aanvanklik teen hul billike waarde op die verkrygingsdatum gemeet. Die maatskappy erken enige nie-beheerbelang in die verkryde onderneming op ’n per-verkryging-basis, hetsy teen die billike waarde of teen die nie-beheerbelang se proporsionele aandeel van die erkende bedrae van die verkryde onderneming se identifiseerbare netto bates.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Grondslag van voorbereiding en "&AccPolicies_IFRS_Name

CellValue_English: Acquisition-related costs are expensed as incurred.
CellFormula_English: 'Acquisition-related costs are expensed as incurred.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Verwerwingsverwante koste word ten tyde van aangegaan as uitgawes erken.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Verwerwingsverwante koste word ten tyde van aangegaan as uitgawes erken.

CellValue_English: If the business combination is achieved in stages, the acquisition date carrying value of the acquirer's previously held equity interest in the acquiree is re-measured to fair value at the acquisition date; any gains or losses arising from such re-measurement are recognised in profit or loss.
CellFormula_English: '="The "&LOWER(AFS_Name_Annual)&" of "&CompanyName&" have been prepared in accordance with "&IF(DisclosureType="Basis of Accounting","the basis of accounting set out below",FrameworkDetail&IF(DisclosureType="Basis of Accounting"," "&INT(accpolicies_num),""))&IF(ApplicableAct="","",IF(AdditionalAct=""," and ",", ")&"the "&ApplicableAct&IF(AdditionalAct="",""," and the "&AdditionalAct))&". The "&LOWER(AFS_Name_Annual)&" have been prepared under the historical cost convention, "&"as modified by the revaluation of land and buildings, available-for-sale financial assets, and financial assets and financial liabilities (including derivative instruments) at fair value through "&PSLower&" or "&LDLower&"."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Indien die samesmelting van besighede in fases plaasvind, word die verkrygingsdatum-dravalue van die verkryger se voorheen aangehoue aandelebelang in die verkregte entiteit teen billike waarde op die verkrygingsdatum herevalueer; enige winste of verliese wat uit sodanige herevaluering ontstaan, word in wins of verlies erken.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Die "&LOWER(AFS_Name_Annual)&" van "&CompanyName&" is opgestel in ooreenstemming met "&IF(DisclosureType="Basis of Accounting","die grondslag van rekeningkunde hieronder uiteengesit",FrameworkDetail&IF(DisclosureType="Basis of Accounting"," "&INT(accpolicies_num),""))&IF(ApplicableAct="","",IF(AdditionalAct=""," en ",", ")&"die "&ApplicableAct&IF(AdditionalAct="",""," en die "&AdditionalAct))&". Die "&LOWER(AFS_Name_Annual)&" is opgestel volgens die historiese koste-konvensie, "&"soos gewysig deur die herevaluering van grond en geboue, beskikbaar-vir-verkoop finansiële bates, en finansiële bates en finansiële laste (insluitend afgeleide instrumente) teen billike waarde deur "&PSLower&" of "&LDLower&"."

CellValue_English: Any contingent consideration to be transferred by the company is recognised at fair value at the acquisition date. Subsequent changes to the fair value of the contingent consideration that is deemed to be an asset or liability is recognised in accordance with IAS 39 either in profit or loss or as a change to other comprehensive income. Contingent consideration that is classified as equity is not re-measured, and its subsequent settlement is accounted for within equity.
CellFormula_English: 'Any contingent consideration to be transferred by the company is recognised at fair value at the acquisition date. Subsequent changes to the fair value of the contingent consideration that is deemed to be an asset or liability is recognised in accordance with IAS 39 either in profit or loss or as a change to other comprehensive income. Contingent consideration that is classified as equity is not re-measured, and its subsequent settlement is accounted for within equity.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Enige voorwaardelike vergoeding wat deur die maatskappy oorgedra moet word, word teen billike waarde op die verkrygingsdatum erken. Verdere veranderinge in die billike waarde van die voorwaardelike vergoeding wat as 'n bate of las beskou word, word ooreenkomstig IAS 39 óf in wins of verlies, óf as 'n verandering in ander omvattende inkomste erken. Voorwaardelike vergoeding wat as ekwiteit geklassifiseer word, word nie herwaardeer nie, en die daaropvolgende afhandeling daarvan word binne ekwiteit verreken.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Enige voorwaardelike vergoeding wat deur die maatskappy oorgedra moet word, word teen billike waarde op die verkrygingsdatum erken. Verdere veranderinge in die billike waarde van die voorwaardelike vergoeding wat as 'n bate of las beskou word, word ooreenkomstig IAS 39 óf in wins of verlies, óf as 'n verandering in ander omvattende inkomste erken. Voorwaardelike vergoeding wat as ekwiteit geklassifiseer word, word nie herwaardeer nie, en die daaropvolgende afhandeling daarvan word binne ekwiteit verreken.

CellValue_English: Inter-company transactions, balances and unrealised gains on transactions between group companies are eliminated. Unrealised losses are also eliminated. When necessary, amounts reported by subsidiaries have been adjusted to conform with the company's accounting policies.
CellFormula_English: '="The "&LOWER(AFS_Name_Annual)&" of "&CompanyName&" have been prepared in accordance with "&IF(DisclosureType="Basis of Accounting","the basis of accounting set out below",FrameworkDetail&IF(DisclosureType="Basis of Accounting"," "&INT(accpolicies_num),""))&IF(ApplicableAct="","",IF(AdditionalAct=""," and ",", ")&"the "&ApplicableAct&IF(AdditionalAct="",""," and the "&AdditionalAct))&". The "&LOWER(AFS_Name_Annual)&" have been prepared under the historical cost convention."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Transaksies, saldo’s en ongerealiseerde winste op transaksies tussen maatskappye binne die groep word uitgeskakel. Ongerealiseerde verliese word ook uitgeskakel. Waar nodig, is bedrae wat deur filiale gerapporteer is, aangepas om in ooreenstemming met die maatskappy se rekeningkundige beleid te wees.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Die "&LOWER(AFS_Name_Annual)&" van "&CompanyName&" is opgestel in ooreenstemming met "&IF(DisclosureType="Basis of Accounting","die grondslag van rekeningkunde hieronder uiteengesit",FrameworkDetail&IF(DisclosureType="Basis of Accounting"," "&INT(accpolicies_num),""))&IF(ApplicableAct="","",IF(AdditionalAct=""," en ",", ")&"die "&ApplicableAct&IF(AdditionalAct="",""," en die "&AdditionalAct))&". Die "&LOWER(AFS_Name_Annual)&" is volgens die historiese kostekonvensie opgestel."

CellValue_English: Changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries without change of control
CellFormula_English: 'Changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries without change of control
CellValue_Afrikaans: Veranderinge in eienaarsbelange in filiale sonder ‘n verandering in beheer
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Veranderinge in eienaarsbelange in filiale sonder ‘n verandering in beheer

CellValue_English: Transactions with non-controlling interests that do not result in loss of control are accounted for as equity transactions – that is, as transactions with the owners in their capacity as owners. The difference between fair value of any consideration paid and the relevant share acquired of the carrying value of net assets of the subsidiary is recorded in equity. Gains or losses on disposals to non-controlling interests are also recorded in equity.
CellFormula_English: '="The preparation of financial statements in conformity with "&IF(DisclosureType="Basis of Accounting","the basis of accounting described below",FrameworkDetail)&" requires the use of certain critical accounting estimates. It also requires "&IF(ManagementReferences="N","the "&LOWER(Director_board),"management")&" to exercise "&IF(ManagementReferences="N",DGender_their,"its")&" judgement in the process of applying the "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" accounting policies. "&IF(AND(IFERROR(@Note_Num_CriticalAccountingEstimatesJudgements_2,"")="",Note_Num_CriticalAccountingEstimatesJudgements=""),"","The areas involving a higher degree of judgement or complexity, or areas where assumptions and estimates are significant to the "&LOWER(AFS_Name_Annual)&" are disclosed in note "&IF(Note_Num_CriticalAccountingEstimatesJudgements="",IFERROR(@Note_Num_CriticalAccountingEstimatesJudgements_2,""),Note_Num_CriticalAccountingEstimatesJudgements))
CellValue_Afrikaans: Transaksies met nie-beherende belange wat nie tot verlies van beheer lei nie, word as ekwiteitstransaksies erken – dit wil sê, as transaksies met die eienaars in hul hoedanigheid as eienaars. Die verskil tussen die billike waarde van enige vergoeding betaal en die toepaslike aandeel verkry van die draende waarde van die netto bates van die filiaal word in ekwiteit aangeteken. Winst of verlies op vervreemding aan nie-beherende belange word ook in ekwiteit aangeteken.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Die opstel van finansiële state in ooreenstemming met "&IF(DisclosureType="Basis of Accounting","die grondslag van rekeningkunde hieronder beskryf",FrameworkDetail)&" vereis die gebruik van sekere kritieke rekeningkundige ramings. Dit vereis ook dat "&IF(ManagementReferences="N","die "&LOWER(Director_board),"bestuur")&" "&IF(ManagementReferences="N",DGender_their,"sy")&" oordeel aanwend in die proses van toepassing van die "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" rekeningkundige beleid. "&IF(AND(IFERROR(@Note_Num_CriticalAccountingEstimatesJudgements_2,"")="",Note_Num_CriticalAccountingEstimatesJudgements=""),"","Die areas wat 'n hoër graad van oordeel of kompleksiteit behels, of areas waar aannames en ramings beduidend is vir die "&LOWER(AFS_Name_Annual)&", word in nota "&IF(Note_Num_CriticalAccountingEstimatesJudgements="",IFERROR(@Note_Num_CriticalAccountingEstimatesJudgements_2,""),Note_Num_CriticalAccountingEstimatesJudgements)&" uiteengesit.")

CellValue_English: Disposal of subsidiaries
CellFormula_English: 'Disposal of subsidiaries
CellValue_Afrikaans: Verkope van filiale
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Verkope van filiale

CellValue_English: When the company ceases to have control any retained interest in the entity is remeasured to its fair value at the date when control is lost, with the change in carrying amount recognised in profit or loss. The fair value is the initial carrying amount for the purposes of subsequently accounting for the retained interest as an associate, joint venture or financial asset. In addition, any amounts previously recognised in other comprehensive income in respect of that entity are accounted for as if the company had directly disposed of the related assets or liabilities. This may mean that amounts previously recognised in other comprehensive income are reclassified to profit or loss.
CellFormula_English: '="The principal accounting policies applied in the preparation of these "&LOWER(AFS_Name)&" are set out "&IF(AccountingPoliciesShow=0,"below","in the "&LOWER(Notes_Name))&"."&IF(YearsToReportOn=1,""," These policies have been consistently applied to all the years presented, unless otherwise stated.")
CellValue_Afrikaans: Wanneer die maatskappy nie meer beheer het nie, word enige oorblywende belang in die entiteit op hertoets tot sy billike waarde op die datum waarop beheer verloor word, met die verandering in die drawaarde wat in wins of verlies erken word. Die billike waarde is die aanvanklike drawaarde vir die doeleindes van die daaropvolgende rekeningkundige verwerking van die oorblywende belang as ‘n geassosieerde, gesamentlike onderneming of finansiële bate. Verder word enige bedrae wat voorheen in ander omvattende inkomste ten opsigte van daardie entiteit erken is, hanteer asof die maatskappy die verwante bates of laste direk vervreem het. Dit kan beteken dat bedrae wat voorheen in ander omvattende inkomste erken is, na wins of verlies herklassifiseer word.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Die hoofrekeningkundige beleidsriglyne wat toegepas is met die opstelling van hierdie "&LOWER(AFS_Name)&" word "&IF(AccountingPoliciesShow=0,"onder uiteengesit","in die "&LOWER(Notes_Name)&" uiteengesit")&"."&IF(YearsToReportOn=1,""," Hierdie beleide is konsekwent op al die jare wat aangebied word, toegepas tensy anders vermeld.")

CellValue_English: Associates
CellFormula_English: 'Associates
CellValue_Afrikaans: Geassosieerde maatskappye
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Geassosieerde maatskappye

CellValue_English: Associates are all entities over which the company has significant influence but not control, generally accompanying a shareholding of between 20% and 50% of the voting rights. Investments in associates are accounted for using the equity method of accounting. Under the equity method, the investment is initially recognised at cost, and the carrying amount is increased or decreased to recognise the investor's share of the profit or loss of the investee after the date of acquisition. The company's investment in associates includes goodwill identified on acquisition.
CellFormula_English: 'Associates are all entities over which the company has significant influence but not control, generally accompanying a shareholding of between 20% and 50% of the voting rights. Investments in associates are accounted for using the equity method of accounting. Under the equity method, the investment is initially recognised at cost, and the carrying amount is increased or decreased to recognise the investor's share of the profit or loss of the investee after the date of acquisition. The company's investment in associates includes goodwill identified on acquisition.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Geassosieerdes is alle entiteite waaroor die maatskappy beduidende invloed, maar nie beheer nie, uitoefen, wat gewoonlik gepaard gaan met 'n aandelebelang van tussen 20% en 50% van die stemregte. Beleggings in geassosieerdes word volgens die ekwiteitsmetode van rekeningkunde verwerk. Ingevolge die ekwiteitsmetode word die belegging aanvanklik teen koste erken, en die drawaarde word verhoog of verlaag om die belegger se aandeel in die wins of verlies van die geassosieerde na die verkrygingsdatum te erken. Die maatskappy se belegging in geassosieerdes sluit goodwill in wat tydens verkryging geïdentifiseer is.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Geassosieerdes is alle entiteite waaroor die maatskappy beduidende invloed, maar nie beheer nie, uitoefen, wat gewoonlik gepaard gaan met 'n aandelebelang van tussen 20% en 50% van die stemregte. Beleggings in geassosieerdes word volgens die ekwiteitsmetode van rekeningkunde verwerk. Ingevolge die ekwiteitsmetode word die belegging aanvanklik teen koste erken, en die drawaarde word verhoog of verlaag om die belegger se aandeel in die wins of verlies van die geassosieerde na die verkrygingsdatum te erken. Die maatskappy se belegging in geassosieerdes sluit goodwill in wat tydens verkryging geïdentifiseer is.

CellValue_English: If the ownership interest in an associate is reduced but significant influence is retained, only a proportionate share of the amounts previously recognised in other comprehensive income is reclassified to profit or loss where appropriate.
CellFormula_English: 'If the ownership interest in an associate is reduced but significant influence is retained, only a proportionate share of the amounts previously recognised in other comprehensive income is reclassified to profit or loss where appropriate.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Indien die eienaarsbelang in ’n geassosieerde maatskappy verminder word maar beduidende invloed behou word, word slegs ’n proporsionele aandeel van die bedrae wat voorheen in ander omvattende inkomste erken is, na wins of verlies herklassifiseer waar toepaslik.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Indien die eienaarsbelang in ’n geassosieerde maatskappy verminder word maar beduidende invloed behou word, word slegs ’n proporsionele aandeel van die bedrae wat voorheen in ander omvattende inkomste erken is, na wins of verlies herklassifiseer waar toepaslik.

CellValue_English: The company's share of post-acquisition profit or loss is recognised in the statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income, and its share of post-acquisition movements in other comprehensive income is recognised in other comprehensive income with a corresponding adjustment to the carrying amount of the investment. When the company's share of losses in an associate equals or exceeds its interest in the associate, including any other unsecured receivables, the company does not recognise further losses, unless it has incurred legal or constructive obligations or made payments on behalf of the associate.
CellFormula_English: 'The company's share of post-acquisition profit or loss is recognised in the statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income, and its share of post-acquisition movements in other comprehensive income is recognised in other comprehensive income with a corresponding adjustment to the carrying amount of the investment. When the company's share of losses in an associate equals or exceeds its interest in the associate, including any other unsecured receivables, the company does not recognise further losses, unless it has incurred legal or constructive obligations or made payments on behalf of the associate.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Die maatskappy se aandeel in wins of verlies na verkryging word in die staat van wins of verlies en ander omvattende inkomste erken, en sy aandeel in bewegings na verkryging in ander omvattende inkomste word in ander omvattende inkomste erken, met 'n ooreenstemmende aanpassing aan die drawaarde van die belegging. Wanneer die maatskappy se aandeel in verliese van 'n geassosieerde entiteit gelyk is aan of meer is as sy belang in die geassosieerde entiteit, insluitend enige ander onversekerde vorderings, erken die maatskappy nie verdere verliese nie, tensy dit wetlike of konstruktiewe verpligtinge aangegaan het of betalings namens die geassosieerde entiteit gedoen het.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Die maatskappy se aandeel in wins of verlies na verkryging word in die staat van wins of verlies en ander omvattende inkomste erken, en sy aandeel in bewegings na verkryging in ander omvattende inkomste word in ander omvattende inkomste erken, met 'n ooreenstemmende aanpassing aan die drawaarde van die belegging. Wanneer die maatskappy se aandeel in verliese van 'n geassosieerde entiteit gelyk is aan of meer is as sy belang in die geassosieerde entiteit, insluitend enige ander onversekerde vorderings, erken die maatskappy nie verdere verliese nie, tensy dit wetlike of konstruktiewe verpligtinge aangegaan het of betalings namens die geassosieerde entiteit gedoen het.

CellValue_English: The company determines at each reporting date whether there is any objective evidence that the investment in the associate is impaired. If this is the case, the company calculates the amount of impairment as the difference between the recoverable amount of the associate and its carrying value and recognises the amount adjacent to share of profit/(loss) of associates in the statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income.
CellFormula_English: '="Subsidiaries are all entities (including structured entities) over which the "&GroupEntityCase&" has control. The "&GroupEntityCase&" controls an entity when the "&GroupEntityCase&" is exposed to, or has rights to, variable returns from its involvement with the entity and has the ability to affect those returns through its power over the entity. "&"Subsidiaries are fully consolidated from the date on which control is transferred to the "&GroupEntityCase&". They are deconsolidated from the date that control ceases."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Die maatskappy bepaal by elke verslagdoeningsdatum of daar enige objektiewe bewys is dat die belegging in die geassosieerde waarde verminder het. Indien dit wel die geval is, bereken die maatskappy die bedrag van die waardevermindering as die verskil tussen die realiseerbare bedrag van die geassosieerde en die drabedrag daarvan, en erken die bedrag langsaan aandeel in wins/(verlies) van geassosieerdes in die staat van wins of verlies en ander omvattende inkomste.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Dogtermaatskappye is alle entiteite (insluitend gestruktureerde entiteite) waaroor die "&GroupEntityCase&" beheer het. Die "&GroupEntityCase&" beheer 'n entiteit wanneer die "&GroupEntityCase&" blootgestel is aan, of regte het op, veranderlike opbrengste uit sy betrokkenheid by die entiteit en die vermoë het om daardie opbrengste te beïnvloed deur sy mag oor die entiteit. "&"Dogtermaatskappye word ten volle gekonsolideer vanaf die datum waarop beheer oorgedra word na die "&GroupEntityCase&". Hulle word gedekonsolideer vanaf die datum waarop beheer ophou."

CellValue_English: Profits and losses resulting from upstream and downstream transactions between the company and its associate are recognised in the company's financial statements only to the extent of unrelated investor's interests in the associates. Unrealised losses are eliminated unless the transaction provides evidence of an impairment of the asset transferred. Accounting policies of associates have been changed where necessary to ensure consistency with the policies adopted by the company.
CellFormula_English: 'Profits and losses resulting from upstream and downstream transactions between the company and its associate are recognised in the company's financial statements only to the extent of unrelated investor's interests in the associates. Unrealised losses are eliminated unless the transaction provides evidence of an impairment of the asset transferred. Accounting policies of associates have been changed where necessary to ensure consistency with the policies adopted by the company.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Wins en verliese wat voortspruit uit opwaartse en afwaartse transaksies tussen die maatskappy en sy geassosieerde word slegs in die maatskappy se finansiële state erken tot die mate van die ongemoeid betrokke belegger se belang in die geassosieerdes. Onvervulde verliese word uitgeskakel, tensy die transaksie bewys lewer van ’n waarde-vermindering van die oorgedra bate. Rekeningkundige beleidsrigtings van geassosieerdes is, waar nodig, aangepas om konsekwentheid met die beleid wat deur die maatskappy aangeneem is, te verseker.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Wins en verliese wat voortspruit uit opwaartse en afwaartse transaksies tussen die maatskappy en sy geassosieerde word slegs in die maatskappy se finansiële state erken tot die mate van die ongemoeid betrokke belegger se belang in die geassosieerdes. Onvervulde verliese word uitgeskakel, tensy die transaksie bewys lewer van ’n waarde-vermindering van die oorgedra bate. Rekeningkundige beleidsrigtings van geassosieerdes is, waar nodig, aangepas om konsekwentheid met die beleid wat deur die maatskappy aangeneem is, te verseker.

CellValue_English: Dilution gains and losses arising in investments in associates are recognised in the statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income.
CellFormula_English: '="The "&GroupEntityCase&" applies the acquisition method to account for business combinations. The consideration transferred for the acquisition of a subsidiary is the fair values of the assets transferred, "&"the liabilities incurred to the former owners of the acquiree and the equity interests issued by the "&GroupEntityCase&". The consideration transferred includes the fair value of any asset or liability resulting from a contingent consideration arrangement. "&"Identifiable assets acquired and liabilities and contingent liabilities assumed in a business combination are measured initially at their fair values at the acquisition date. The "&GroupEntityCase&" recognises any non-controlling interest in the acquiree on an acquisition-by-acquisition basis, either at fair value or at the non-controlling interest's proportionate share of the recognised amounts of acquiree's identifiable net assets."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Verwateringwinste en -verliese wat ontstaan by beleggings in geassosieerdes, word in die staat van wins of verlies en ander omvattende inkomste erken.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Die "&GroupEntityCase&" pas die verkrygingsmetode toe om vir samesmeltings van besighede rekenskap te doen. Die vergoeding oorgedra vir die verkryging van 'n filiaal is die billike waarde van die bates wat oorgedra is, "&"die laste wat aangegaan is teenoor die vorige eienaars van die verkrygte en die ekwiteitsbelange uitgereik deur die "&GroupEntityCase&". Die oorgedraagde vergoeding sluit die billike waarde in van enige bate of las wat voortspruit uit 'n voorwaardelike vergoedingsooreenkoms. "&"Identifiseerbare bates wat verkry is en laste en voorwaardelike laste wat by 'n samesmelting van besighede aanvaar word, word aanvanklik gemeet teen hul billike waarde op die verkrygingsdatum. Die "&GroupEntityCase&" erken enige nie-beherende aandeel in die verkrygte op 'n verkryging-vir-verkryging-basis, hetsy teen billike waarde of teen die nie-beherende aandeel se proporsionele aandeel van die erkende bedrae van die verkrygte se identifiseerbare netto bates."

CellValue_English: Joint arrangements
CellFormula_English: 'Joint arrangements
CellValue_Afrikaans: Gesamentlike reëlings
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Gesamentlike reëlings

CellValue_English: The company applies IFRS 11 to all joint arrangements. Under IFRS 11 investments in joint arrangements are classified as either joint operations or joint ventures depending on the contractual rights and obligations each investor. IFRS GAAP plc has assessed the nature of its joint arrangements and determined them to be joint ventures. Joint ventures are accounted for using the equity method.
CellFormula_English: 'The company applies IFRS 11 to all joint arrangements. Under IFRS 11 investments in joint arrangements are classified as either joint operations or joint ventures depending on the contractual rights and obligations each investor. IFRS GAAP plc has assessed the nature of its joint arrangements and determined them to be joint ventures. Joint ventures are accounted for using the equity method.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Die maatskappy pas IFRS 11 toe op alle gesamentlike reëlings. Ingevolge IFRS 11 word beleggings in gesamentlike reëlings geklassifiseer as óf gesamentlike bedrywighede óf gesamentlike ondernemings, afhangende van die kontraktuele regte en verpligtinge van elke belegger. IFRS GAAP Bpk het die aard van sy gesamentlike reëlings beoordeel en dit as gesamentlike ondernemings bepaal. Gesamentlike ondernemings word volgens die ekwiteitsmetode verreken.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Die maatskappy pas IFRS 11 toe op alle gesamentlike reëlings. Ingevolge IFRS 11 word beleggings in gesamentlike reëlings geklassifiseer as óf gesamentlike bedrywighede óf gesamentlike ondernemings, afhangende van die kontraktuele regte en verpligtinge van elke belegger. IFRS GAAP Bpk het die aard van sy gesamentlike reëlings beoordeel en dit as gesamentlike ondernemings bepaal. Gesamentlike ondernemings word volgens die ekwiteitsmetode verreken.

CellValue_English: The company applies Section 15 to all joint arrangements. Under Section 15 investments in joint controlled entities are classified as either joint operations or joint ventures depending on the contractual rights and obligations each investor. IFRS GAAP plc has assessed the nature of its joint arrangements and determined them to be joint ventures. Joint ventures are accounted for using the equity method.
CellFormula_English: 'The company applies Section 15 to all joint arrangements. Under Section 15 investments in joint controlled entities are classified as either joint operations or joint ventures depending on the contractual rights and obligations each investor. IFRS GAAP plc has assessed the nature of its joint arrangements and determined them to be joint ventures. Joint ventures are accounted for using the equity method.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Die maatskappy pas Artikel 15 toe op alle gesamentlike reëlings. Volgens Artikel 15 word beleggings in gesamentlik-beheerde entiteite geklassifiseer as óf gesamentlike operasies óf gesamentlike ondernemings, afhangende van die kontraktuele regte en verpligtinge van elke belegger. IFRS GAAP Bpk het die aard van sy gesamentlike reëlings geëvalueer en bepaal dat dit gesamentlike ondernemings is. Gesamentlike ondernemings word volgens die ekwiteitsmetode verreken.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Die maatskappy pas Artikel 15 toe op alle gesamentlike reëlings. Volgens Artikel 15 word beleggings in gesamentlik-beheerde entiteite geklassifiseer as óf gesamentlike operasies óf gesamentlike ondernemings, afhangende van die kontraktuele regte en verpligtinge van elke belegger. IFRS GAAP Bpk het die aard van sy gesamentlike reëlings geëvalueer en bepaal dat dit gesamentlike ondernemings is. Gesamentlike ondernemings word volgens die ekwiteitsmetode verreken.

CellValue_English: Under the equity method of accounting, interests in joint ventures are initially recognised at cost and adjusted thereafter to recognise the company's share of the post-acquisition profits or losses and movements in other comprehensive income. When the company's share of losses in a joint venture equals or exceeds its interests in the joint ventures (which includes any long-term interests that, in substance, form part of the company's net investment in the joint ventures), the company does not recognise further losses, unless it has incurred obligations or made payments on behalf of the joint ventures.
CellFormula_English: '="If the business combination is achieved in stages, the acquisition date carrying value of the acquirer's previously held equity interest in the acquiree is re-measured to fair value at the acquisition date; "&"any gains or losses arising from such re-measurement are recognised in "&PSLower&" or "&LDLower&"."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Ingevolge die ekwiteitsmetode van rekeningkunde, word belange in gesamentlike ondernemings aanvanklik teen koste erken en daarna aangepas om die maatskappy se aandeel in die winste of verliese ná verkryging en bewegings in ander omvattende inkomste te erken. Wanneer die maatskappy se aandeel in verliese in 'n gesamentlike onderneming gelyk is aan of meer is as sy belang in die gesamentlike ondernemings (wat enige langtermynbelange insluit wat in wese deel vorm van die maatskappy se netto belegging in die gesamentlike ondernemings), erken die maatskappy nie verdere verliese nie, tensy dit verpligtinge aangegaan het of betalings namens die gesamentlike ondernemings gemaak het.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Indien die samesmelting van besighede stapsgewys plaasvind, word die verkrygingsdatum-draende waarde van die verkryger se voorheen gehanteerde ekwiteitsbelang in die verkrygte entiteit herwaardeer teen billike waarde op die verkrygingsdatum; "&"enige winste of verliese wat voortspruit uit sodanige herwaardering word erken in "&PSLower&" of "&LDLower&"."

CellValue_English: Unrealised gains on transactions between the company and its joint ventures are eliminated to the extent of the company's interest in the joint ventures. Unrealised losses are also eliminated unless the transaction provides evidence of an impairment of the asset transferred. Accounting policies of the joint ventures have been changed where necessary to ensure consistency with the policies adopted by the company.
CellFormula_English: 'Unrealised gains on transactions between the company and its joint ventures are eliminated to the extent of the company's interest in the joint ventures. Unrealised losses are also eliminated unless the transaction provides evidence of an impairment of the asset transferred. Accounting policies of the joint ventures have been changed where necessary to ensure consistency with the policies adopted by the company.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Onvervulde winste op transaksies tussen die maatskappy en sy gesamentlike ondernemings word uitgeskakel tot die mate van die maatskappy se belang in die gesamentlike ondernemings. Onvervulde verliese word ook uitgeskakel, tensy die transaksie getuienis lewer van 'n waardevermindering van die oorgedraaide bate. Rekeningkundige beleid van die gesamentlike ondernemings is waar nodig aangepas om konsekwentheid met die beleid wat deur die maatskappy aangeneem is, te verseker.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Onvervulde winste op transaksies tussen die maatskappy en sy gesamentlike ondernemings word uitgeskakel tot die mate van die maatskappy se belang in die gesamentlike ondernemings. CellFormula_English: '="Any contingent consideration to be transferred by the "&GroupEntityCase&" is recognised at fair value at the acquisition date. Subsequent changes to the fair value of the contingent consideration that is deemed to be an asset or liability is recognised in accordance with IAS 39 either in "&PSLower&" or "&LDLower&" or as a change to other comprehensive income. Contingent consideration that is classified as equity is not re-measured, and its subsequent settlement is accounted for within equity."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Vertaling van buitelandse valuta
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Enige voorwaardelike vergoeding wat deur die "&GroupEntityCase&" oorgedra moet word, word teen billike waarde op die verkrygingsdatum erken. Verdere veranderinge aan die billike waarde van die voorwaardelike vergoeding wat as 'n bate of las beskou word, word ingevolge IAS 39 erken, hetsy in "&PSLower&" of "&LDLower&" of as 'n verandering in ander omvattende inkomste. Voorwaardelike vergoeding wat as ekwiteit geklassifiseer is, word nie hergemeet nie, en die daaropvolgende vereffening daarvan word binne ekwiteit verantwoord."

Wins en verliese wat voortspruit uit die vereffening van sodanige transaksies en uit die omrekening, teen jaareinde-wisselkoerse, van monetêre bates en laste wat in vreemde geldeenhede denomineer is, word in wins of verlies erken.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Transaksies in vreemde geldeenhede word omgeskakel na die funksionele geldeenheid teen die wisselkoerse wat op die datums van die transaksies van toepassing was. Wins en verliese wat voortspruit uit die vereffening van sodanige transaksies en uit die omrekening, teen jaareinde-wisselkoerse, van monetêre bates en laste wat in vreemde geldeenhede denomineer is, word in wins of verlies erken.

CellValue_English: Foreign exchange gains and losses that relate to borrowings and cash and cash equivalents are presented in profit or loss within 'finance income or costs'. All other foreign exchange gains and losses are presented in profit or loss within 'other (losses)/gains – net'.
CellFormula_English: 'Foreign exchange gains and losses that relate to borrowings and cash and cash equivalents are presented in profit or loss within 'finance income or costs'. All other foreign exchange gains and losses are presented in profit or loss within 'other (losses)/gains – net'.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Buitelandse valuta-winsste en -verliese wat verband hou met lenings en kontant en kontantekwivalente word in die wins- of verliesstaat by 'finansiële inkomste of koste' aangebied. Alle ander buitelandse valuta-winsste en -verliese word in die wins- of verliesstaat by 'ander (verliese)/wins – netto' aangebied.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Buitelandse valuta-winsste en -verliese wat verband hou met lenings en kontant en kontantekwivalente word in die wins- of verliesstaat by 'finansiële inkomste of koste' aangebied. Alle ander buitelandse valuta-winsste en -verliese word in die wins- of verliesstaat by 'ander (verliese)/wins – netto' aangebied.

CellValue_English: Group companies
CellFormula_English: 'Group companies
CellValue_Afrikaans: Groepsmaatskappye
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Groepsmaatskappye

CellValue_English: The results and financial position of all the company's entities that have a functional currency different from the presentation currency are translated into the presentation currency as follows:
CellFormula_English: '="When the "&GroupEntityCase&" ceases to have control any retained interest in the entity is remeasured to its fair value at the date when control is lost, with the change in carrying amount recognised in "&PSLower&" or "&LDLower&". The fair value is the initial carrying amount for the purposes of subsequently accounting for the retained interest as an associate, joint venture or financial asset. "&"In addition, any amounts previously recognised in other comprehensive income in respect of that entity are accounted for as if the "&GroupEntityCase&" had directly disposed of the related assets or liabilities. This may mean that amounts previously recognised in other comprehensive income are reclassified to "&PSLower&" or "&LDLower&"."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Die uitslae en finansiële posisie van al die maatskappy se entiteite wat 'n funksionele geldeenheid het wat van die aanbiedingsgeldeenheid verskil, word soos volg in die aanbiedingsgeldeenheid omgeskakel:
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Wanneer die "&GroupEntityCase&" ophou om beheer te hê, word enige oorblywende belang in die entiteit teen die billike waarde gemeet op die datum waarop beheer verloor word, met die verandering in die drawaarde wat in "&PSLower&" of "&LDLower&" erken word. Die billike waarde is die aanvanklike drawaarde vir die doel van daaropvolgende rekeningkunde van die oorblywende belang as 'n geassosieerde, gesamentlike onderneming of finansiële bate. "&"Verder word enige bedrae wat voorheen in ander omvattende inkomste ten opsigte van daardie entiteit erken is, hanteer asof die "&GroupEntityCase&" die verwante bates of laste direk vervreem het. Dit kan beteken dat bedrae wat voorheen in ander omvattende inkomste erken is, herkategoriseer word na "&PSLower&" of "&LDLower&"."

CellFormula_English: '="Associates are all entities over which the "&GroupEntityCase&" has significant influence but not control, generally accompanying a shareholding of between 20% and 50% of the voting rights. "&"Investments in associates are accounted for using the equity method of accounting. "&"Under the equity method, the investment is initially recognised at cost, and the carrying amount is increased or decreased to recognise the investor's share of the "&PSLower&" or "&LDLower&" of the investee after the date of acquisition. The "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" investment in associates includes goodwill identified on acquisition."
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Geassosieerdes is alle entiteite waaroor die "&GroupEntityCase&" beduidende invloed het maar nie beheer nie, en gewoonlik gepaard gaan met ’n aandelebelang van tussen 20% en 50% van die stemregte. "&"Beleggings in geassosieerdes word volgens die ekwiteitsmetode van rekeningkunde verklaar. "&"Ingevolge die ekwiteitsmetode word die belegging aanvanklik teen koste erken, en die draende waarde word verhoog of verlaag om die belegger se aandeel in die "&PSLower&" of "&LDLower&" van die geassosieerde na die datum van verkryging te erken. Die "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" belegging in geassosieerdes sluit goodwill wat met verkryging geïdentifiseer is in."

CellValue_English: Goodwill and fair value adjustments arising on the acquisition of a foreign operation are treated as assets and liabilities of the foreign operation and translated at the closing rate at each reporting date.
CellFormula_English: 'Goodwill and fair value adjustments arising on the acquisition of a foreign operation are treated as assets and liabilities of the foreign operation and translated at the closing rate at each reporting date.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Goodwill en billikewaardeverstellings wat ontstaan het by die verkryging van 'n buitelandse bedryf, word as bates en laste van die buitelandse bedryf hanteer en teen die sluitingskoers op elke verslagdoeningsdatum vertaal.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Goodwill en billikewaardeverstellings wat ontstaan het by die verkryging van 'n buitelandse bedryf, word as bates en laste van die buitelandse bedryf hanteer en teen die sluitingskoers op elke verslagdoeningsdatum vertaal.

CellValue_English: Property, plant and equipment
CellFormula_English: '="If the ownership interest in an associate is reduced but significant influence is retained, only a proportionate share of the amounts previously recognised in other comprehensive income is reclassified to "&PSLower&" or "&LDLower&" where appropriate."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Eiendom, aanleg en toerusting
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Indien die eienaarskapsbelang in 'n geassosieerde maatskappy verminder word maar beduidende invloed behou word, word slegs 'n proporsionele deel van die bedrae wat voorheen in ander omvattende inkomste erken is, herklassifiseer na "&PSLower&" of "&LDLower&" waar toepaslik."

CellValue_English: Definition
CellFormula_English: 'Definition
CellValue_Afrikaans: Definisie
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Definisie

CellValue_English: Property, plant and equipment are tangible items that:
CellFormula_English: '="The "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" share of post-acquisition "&PSLower&" or "&LDLower&" is recognised in the "&LOWER(SoCI_Name)&", and its share of post-acquisition movements in other comprehensive income is recognised in other comprehensive income with a corresponding adjustment to the carrying amount of the investment. When the "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" share of losses in an associate equals or exceeds its interest in the associate, including any other unsecured receivables, the "&GroupEntityCase&" does not recognise further losses, unless it has incurred legal or constructive obligations or made payments on behalf of the associate."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Eiendom, aanleg en toerusting is tasbare items wat:
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Die "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" aandeel van na-verkryging "&PSLower&" of "&LDLower&" word in die "&LOWER(SoCI_Name)&" erken, en sy aandeel van na-verkryging bewegings in ander omvattende inkomste word in ander omvattende inkomste erken met 'n ooreenstemmende aanpassing tot die draende bedrag van die belegging. Wanneer die "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" aandeel van verliese in 'n geassosieerde die belang in die geassosieerde gelyk of oorskry, insluitend enige ander onversekerde vorderings, erken die "&GroupEntityCase&" geen verdere verliese nie, tensy dit regtelike of konstruktiewe verpligtinge aangegaan het of betalings namens die geassosieerde gemaak het."

CellFormula_English: '="The "&GroupEntityCase&" determines at each reporting date whether there is any objective evidence that the investment in the associate is impaired. If this is the case, the "&GroupEntityCase&" calculates the amount of impairment as the difference between the recoverable amount of the associate and its carrying value and recognises the amount adjacent to share of "&PSLower&"/("&LDLower&") of associates in the "&LOWER(SoCI_Name)&"."
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Die "&GroupEntityCase&" bepaal by elke verslagdoeningdatum of daar enige objektiewe bewys is dat die belegging in die geassosieerde waarde verminder is. Indien dit die geval is, bereken die "&GroupEntityCase&" die bedrag van die waardevermindering as die verskil tussen die verhaalbare bedrag van die geassosieerde en sy boekwaarde en erken die bedrag langsaan aandeel van "&PSLower&"/("&LDLower&") van geassosieerdes in die "&LOWER(SoCI_Name)&"."

CellValue_English: Recognition
CellFormula_English: 'Recognition
CellValue_Afrikaans: Erkenning
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Erkenning

CellValue_English: Property, plant and equipment is recognised as an asset when:
CellFormula_English: '="Profits and losses resulting from upstream and downstream transactions between the "&GroupEntityCase&" and its associate are recognised in the "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" financial statements only to the extent of unrelated investor's interests in the associates. "&"Unrealised losses are eliminated unless the transaction provides evidence of an impairment of the asset transferred. "&"Accounting policies of associates have been changed where necessary to ensure consistency with the policies adopted by the "&GroupEntityCase&"."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Eiendom, aanleg en toerusting word as ’n bate erken wanneer:
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Wins en verliese wat voortspruit uit op- en afstroomtransaksies tussen die "&GroupEntityCase&" en sy geassosieerde word slegs in die "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" finansiële state erken tot die mate van die nie-verwante belegger se belange in die geassosieerdes. "&"Onwerklike verliese word uitgeskakel tensy die transaksie bewys lewer van 'n waardedaling van die oorgedraagde bate. "&"Rekeningkundige beleide van geassosieerdes is waar nodig verander om konsekwentheid met die beleide wat deur die "&GroupEntityCase&" aangeneem is, te verseker."

CellFormula_English: '="Dilution gains and losses arising in investments in associates are recognised in the "&LOWER(SoCI_Name)&"."
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Verwateringswinste en -verliese wat ontstaan by beleggings in geassosieerdes word in die "&LOWER(SoCI_Name)&" erken."

CellValue_English: Initial measurement
CellFormula_English: 'Initial measurement
CellValue_Afrikaans: Aanvanklike meting
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Aanvanklike meting

CellValue_English: An item of property, plant and equipment that qualifies for recognition as an asset is initially measured at its cost.
CellFormula_English: 'An item of property, plant and equipment that qualifies for recognition as an asset is initially measured at its cost.
CellValue_Afrikaans: ’n Batesitem van eiendom, aanleg en toerusting wat vir erkenning as ’n bate kwalifiseer, word aanvanklik teen die koste daarvan gemeet.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '’n Batesitem van eiendom, aanleg en toerusting wat vir erkenning as ’n bate kwalifiseer, word aanvanklik teen die koste daarvan gemeet.

CellValue_English: The cost of an item of property, plant and equipment includes:
CellFormula_English: '="The "&GroupEntityCase&" applies IFRS 11 to all joint arrangements. Under IFRS 11 investments in joint arrangements are classified as either joint operations or "&"joint ventures depending on the contractual rights and obligations each investor. IFRS GAAP plc has assessed the nature of its joint arrangements and determined them to be joint ventures. "&"Joint ventures are accounted for using the equity method."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Die koste van ’n item van eiendom, aanleg en toerusting sluit die volgende in:
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Die koste van ’n item van eiendom, aanleg en toerusting sluit die volgende in:"

CellFormula_English: '="The "&GroupEntityCase&" applies Section 15 to all joint arrangements. Under Section 15 investments in joint controlled entities are classified as either joint operations or "&"joint ventures depending on the contractual rights and obligations each investor. IFRS GAAP plc has assessed the nature of its joint arrangements and determined them to be joint ventures. Joint ventures are accounted for using the equity method."
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Die "&GroupEntityCase&" pas Afdeling 15 op alle gesamentlike reëlings toe. Kragtens Afdeling 15 word beleggings in gesamentlike beheerde entiteite geklassifiseer as óf gesamentlike bedrywighede óf gesamentlike ondernemings, afhangende van die kontraktuele regte en verpligtinge van elke belegger. IFRS GAAP bk het die aard van sy gesamentlike reëlings beoordeel en bepaal dit as gesamentlike ondernemings. Gesamentlike ondernemings word volgens die ekwiteitsmetode verreken."

CellValue_English: Subsequent measurement - Cost model
CellFormula_English: '="Under the equity method of accounting, interests in joint ventures are initially recognised at cost and adjusted thereafter to recognise the "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" share of the post-acquisition profits or losses and movements in other comprehensive income. When the "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" share of losses in a joint venture equals or exceeds its interests in the joint ventures (which includes any long-term interests that, in substance, form part of the "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" net investment in the joint ventures), the "&GroupEntityCase&" does not recognise further losses, unless it has incurred obligations or made payments on behalf of the joint ventures."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Subsekwente meting - Kostemodel
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Kragtens die ekwiteitsmetode van rekeningkunde word belange in gesamentlike ondernemings aanvanklik teen koste erken en daarna aangepas om die "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" se aandeel in die winste of verliese na verkryging en bewegings in ander omvattende inkomste te erken. Wanneer die "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" se aandeel aan verliese in 'n gesamentlike onderneming gelyk is aan of meer as sy belang in die gesamentlike ondernemings (wat enige langtermynbelange insluit wat in wese deel is van die "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" netto belegging in die gesamentlike ondernemings), erken die "&GroupEntityCase&" nie verdere verliese nie, tensy dit verpligtinge aangegaan het of betalings namens die gesamentlike ondernemings gedoen het."

CellValue_English: After initial recognition, property, plant and equipment is measured at cost less any accumulated depreciation and any accumulated impairment losses.
CellFormula_English: 'After initial recognition, property, plant and equipment is measured at cost less any accumulated depreciation and any accumulated impairment losses.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Na aanvanklike erkenning word eiendom, aanleg en toerusting teen koste minus enige opgehoopte waardevermindering en enige opgehoopte waardedaling gemeet.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Na aanvanklike erkenning word eiendom, aanleg en toerusting teen koste minus enige opgehoopte waardevermindering en enige opgehoopte waardedaling gemeet.

CellValue_English: Subsequent measurement - Revaluation model
CellFormula_English: '="Unrealised gains on transactions between the "&GroupEntityCase&" and its joint ventures are eliminated to the extent of the "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" interest in the joint ventures. Unrealised losses are also eliminated unless the transaction provides evidence of an impairment of the asset transferred. "&"Accounting policies of the joint ventures have been changed where necessary to ensure consistency with the policies adopted by the "&GroupEntityCase&"."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Subsequent meting - Herwaardasiesmodel
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Onvervulde winste op transaksies tussen die "&GroupEntityCase&" en sy gesamentlike ondernemings word uitgeskakel tot die mate van die "&GroupEntityCaseAp&" belang in die gesamentlike ondernemings. Onvervulde verliese word ook uitgeskakel tensy die transaksie bewys van 'n waardedaling van die oorgedra bate lewer. "&"Rekeningkundige beleidsrigtings van die gesamentlike ondernemings is verander waar nodig om konsekwentheid met die beleidsrigtings wat deur die "&GroupEntityCase&" aanvaar is te verseker."

CellValue_English: After initial recognition, property, plant and equipment is measured at a revalued amount, being its fair value at the date of the revaluation less any subsequent accumulated depreciation and subsequent accumulated impairment losses.
CellFormula_English: 'After initial recognition, property, plant and equipment is measured at a revalued amount, being its fair value at the date of the revaluation less any subsequent accumulated depreciation and subsequent accumulated impairment losses.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Na aanvanklike erkenning word eiendom, aanleg en toerusting teen ‘n hertoetsde bedrag gemeet, naamlik die billike waarde daarvan op die datum van die hertoetsing minus enige daaropvolgende opgehoopte waardevermindering en daaropvolgende opgehoopte waarde-verminderingsverliese.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Na aanvanklike erkenning word eiendom, aanleg en toerusting teen ‘n hertoetsde bedrag gemeet, naamlik die billike waarde daarvan op die datum van die hertoetsing minus enige daaropvolgende opgehoopte waardevermindering en daaropvolgende opgehoopte waarde-verminderingsverliese.

CellValue_English: Subsequent measurement - Revaluation and Cost model
CellFormula_English: 'Subsequent measurement - Revaluation and Cost model
CellValue_Afrikaans: Daaropvolgende meting – Herwaardasies- en Kostemodel
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Daaropvolgende meting – Herwaardasies- en Kostemodel

CellValue_English: After initial recognition, property, plant and equipment is measured at cost less any accumulated depreciation and any accumulated impairment losses except for __________, ___________ and _________ which are measured at a revalued amount, being its fair value at the date of the revaluation less any subsequent accumulated depreciation and subsequent accumulated impairment losses.
CellFormula_English: 'After initial recognition, property, plant and equipment is measured at cost less any accumulated depreciation and any accumulated impairment losses except for __________, ___________ and _________ which are measured at a revalued amount, being its fair value at the date of the revaluation less any subsequent accumulated depreciation and subsequent accumulated impairment losses.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Na aanvanklike erkenning word eiendom, aanleg en toerusting teen koste minus enige opgehoopte waardevermindering en enige opgehoopte waardedaling gemeet, behalwe vir __________, ___________ en _________ wat teen 'n herwaardeerde bedrag gemeet word, naamlik die billike waarde op die datum van herwaardasie minus enige daaropvolgende opgehoopte waardevermindering en enige daaropvolgende opgehoopte waardedaling.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Na aanvanklike erkenning word eiendom, aanleg en toerusting teen koste minus enige opgehoopte waardevermindering en enige opgehoopte waardedaling gemeet, behalwe vir __________, ___________ en _________ wat teen 'n herwaardeerde bedrag gemeet word, naamlik die billike waarde op die datum van herwaardasie minus enige daaropvolgende opgehoopte waardevermindering en enige daaropvolgende opgehoopte waardedaling.

CellValue_English: Revaluations are performed with sufficient regularity to ensure that the carrying amount does not differ materially from that which would be determined using fair value at the end of the reporting period.
CellFormula_English: 'Revaluations are performed with sufficient regularity to ensure that the carrying amount does not differ materially from that which would be determined using fair value at the end of the reporting period.
CellValue_Afrikaans: Herverassings word met voldoende reëlmaat uitgevoer om te verseker dat die drabedrag nie wesenlik verskil van dié wat bepaal sou word deur die billike waarde aan die einde van die verslagdoeningsperiode te gebruik nie.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Herverassings word met voldoende reëlmaat uitgevoer om te verseker dat die drabedrag nie wesenlik verskil van dié wat bepaal sou word deur die billike waarde aan die einde van die verslagdoeningsperiode te gebruik nie.

CellValue_English: When an item of property, plant and equipment is revalued, the carrying amount of that asset is adjusted to the revalued amount. At the date of the revaluation, [the accumulated depreciation at the date of the revaluation is adjusted to equal the difference between the gross carrying amount and the carrying amount of the asset after taking into account accumulated impairment losses. / the accumulated depreciation is eliminated against the gross carrying amount of the asset.]
CellFormula_English: '="The "&LOWER(AFS_Name_Annual)&" have been presented in "&CurrencyDescription&". The functional currency of the "&EntityDescriptionCase&" is CURRENCY. The presentation currency has been selected because..."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Wanneer ’n item van eiendom, aanleg en toerusting herwaardeer word, word die boekwaarde van daardie bate aangepas na die herwaardeerde bedrag. Op die datum van die herwaardasie, [word die opgehoopte waardevermindering op die datum van die herwaardasie aangepas om gelyk te wees aan die verskil tussen die bruto boekwaarde en die boekwaarde van die bate nadat opgehoopte waardeverminderingsverliese in ag geneem is. / word die opgehoopte waardevermindering teen die bruto boekwaarde van die bate uitgeskakel.]
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Die "&LOWER(AFS_Name_Annual)&" is in "&CurrencyDescription&" voorgehou. Die funksionele geldeenheid van die "&EntityDescriptionCase&" is GELDEENHEID. Die aanbiedingsgeldeenheid is gekies omdat..."

CellValue_English: An increase in the carrying value of an asset as a result of a revaluation is recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity under the revaluation surplus except where the increase reverses a previously recognised revaluation decrease for the same asset, the increase is recognised in profit or loss to that extent.
CellFormula_English: 'An increase in the carrying value of an asset as a result of a revaluation is recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity under the revaluation surplus except where the increase reverses a previously recognised revaluation decrease for the same asset, the increase is recognised in profit or loss to that extent.
CellValue_Afrikaans: ’n Verhoging in die drawaarde van ’n bate as gevolg van ’n herwaardasie word in ander omvattende inkomste erken en in ekwiteit opgehoop onder die herwaardasie-oorwaarde, behalwe waar die verhoging ’n voorheen erkende herwaardasieverlaging vir dieselfde bate omkeer; die verhoging word tot daardie mate in wins of verlies erken.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '’n Verhoging in die drawaarde van ’n bate as gevolg van ’n herwaardasie word in ander omvattende inkomste erken en in ekwiteit opgehoop onder die herwaardasie-oorwaarde, behalwe waar die verhoging ’n voorheen erkende herwaardasieverlaging vir dieselfde bate omkeer; die verhoging word tot daardie mate in wins of verlies erken.

CellValue_English: A decrease in the carrying value of an asset as a result of a revaluation is recognised in profit or loss except where the decrease reverses a previously recognised revaluation increase for the same asset, the decrease is recognised in other comprehensive income to that extent and reduces the amount accumulated in equity under revaluation surplus.
CellFormula_English: 'A decrease in the carrying value of an asset as a result of a revaluation is recognised in profit or loss except where the decrease reverses a previously recognised revaluation increase for the same asset, the decrease is recognised in other comprehensive income to that extent and reduces the amount accumulated in equity under revaluation surplus.
CellValue_Afrikaans: ’n Afname in die boekwaarde van ’n bate as gevolg van ’n herevaluasie word in wins of verlies erken, behalwe waar die afname ’n voorheen erkende herevalueringsverhoging vir dieselfde bate omkeer; in so ’n geval word die afname, tot daardie mate, in ander omvattende inkomste erken en verminder die bedrag wat onder herevalueringsurplus in ekwiteit opgehoop is.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '’n Afname in die boekwaarde van ’n bate as gevolg van ’n herevaluasie word in wins of verlies erken, behalwe waar die afname ’n voorheen erkende herevalueringsverhoging vir dieselfde bate omkeer; in so ’n geval word die afname, tot daardie mate, in ander omvattende inkomste erken en verminder die bedrag wat onder herevalueringsurplus in ekwiteit opgehoop is.

CellValue_English: The revaluation surplus in equity related to a specific item of property, plant and equipment is transferred directly to retained earnings when the asset is derecognised. [except for _____________ where the surplus is transferred as the asset is used. In these cases the amount transferred is the difference between the depreciation based on the revalued carrying amount and the original cost of of the related assets.]
CellFormula_English: 'The revaluation surplus in equity related to a specific item of property, plant and equipment is transferred directly to retained earnings when the asset is derecognised. [except for _____________ where the surplus is transferred as the asset is used. In these cases the amount transferred is the difference between the depreciation based on the revalued carrying amount and the original cost of of the related assets.]
CellValue_Afrikaans: Die herwaardasie-oorbetaling in ekwiteit wat verband hou met 'n spesifieke item van eiendom, aanleg en toerusting, word direk na opgehoopte wins oorgedra wanneer die bate afgeskryf word. [behalwe vir _____________ waar die oorbetaling oorgedra word soos die bate gebruik word. In hierdie gevalle is die bedrag wat oorgedra word die verskil tussen die waardevermindering gebaseer op die herwaardeerde draende bedrag en die oorspronklike koste van die betrokke bates.]
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Die herwaardasie-oorbetaling in ekwiteit wat verband hou met 'n spesifieke item van eiendom, aanleg en toerusting, word direk na opgehoopte wins oorgedra wanneer die bate afgeskryf word. [behalwe vir _____________ waar die oorbetaling oorgedra word soos die bate gebruik word. In hierdie gevalle is die bedrag wat oorgedra word die verskil tussen die waardevermindering gebaseer op die herwaardeerde draende bedrag en die oorspronklike koste van die betrokke bates.]

CellValue_English: Subsequent expenditure
CellFormula_English: 'Subsequent expenditure
CellValue_Afrikaans: Latere uitgawe
CellFormula_Afrikaans: 'Latere uitgawe

CellValue_English: Subsequent expenditure incurred on items of property, plant and equipment is only capitalised to the extent that such expenditure enhances the value or previous capacity of those assets. Repairs and maintenance not deemed to enhance the economic benefit or service potential of items of property, plant and equipment are expensed as incurred.
CellFormula_English: '="Foreign currency transactions are translated into the functional currency using the exchange rates prevailing at the dates of the transactions. "&"Foreign exchange gains and losses resulting from the settlement of such transactions and from the translation at year-end exchange rates of monetary assets and liabilities denominated in foreign currencies are recognised in "&PSLower&" or "&LDLower&"."
CellValue_Afrikaans: Latere uitgawes aangegaan op items van eiendom, aanleg en toerusting word slegs gekapitaliseer tot die mate dat sodanige uitgawes die waarde of vorige kapasiteit van daardie bates verbeter. Herstelwerk en instandhouding wat nie geag word om die ekonomiese voordeel of dienspotensiaal van items van eiendom, aanleg en toerusting te verhoog nie, word as uitgawes erken wanneer dit aangegaan word.
CellFormula_Afrikaans: '="Latere uitgawes aangegaan op items van eiendom, aanleg en toerusting word slegs gekapitaliseer tot die mate dat sodanige uitgawes die waarde of vorige kapasiteit van daardie bates verbeter. CellValue_English: Impairments

CellValue_English: The entity tests for impairment where there is an indication that an asset may be impaired. An assessment of whether there is an indication of possible impairment is done at each reporting date. Where the carrying amount of an item of property, plant and equipment is greater than the estimated recoverable amount, it is written down immediately to its recoverable amount. The resulting impairment loss is recognised immediately in profit or loss, except where the decrease reverses a previously recognised revaluation increase for the same asset the decrease is recognised in other comprehensive income to that extent and reduces the amount accumulated in equity under revaluation surplus, and future depreciation charges are adjusted in future periods to allocate the revised carrying amount, less its residual value, on a systematic basis over its remaining useful life.
CellFormula_English: 'The entity tests for impairment where there is an indication that an asset may be impaired. An assessment of whether there is an indication of possible impairment is done at each reporting date. Where the carrying amount of an item of property, plant and equipment is greater than the estimated recoverable amount, it is written down immediately to its recoverable amount. The resulting impairment loss is recognised immediately in profit or loss, except where the decrease reverses a previously recognised revaluation increase for the same asset the decrease is recognised in other comprehensive income to that extent and reduces the amount accumulated in equity under revaluation surplus, and future depreciation charges are adjusted in future periods to allocate the revised carrying amount, less its residual value, on a systematic basis over its remaining useful life.

CellValue_English: Where the estimated impairment loss exceeds the carrying amount of the asset to which it relates, the resulting liability is only recognised if it is required by another standard.
CellFormula_English: 'Where the estimated impairment loss exceeds the carrying amount of the asset to which it relates, the resulting liability is only recognised if it is required by another standard.

CellValue_English: Compensation from third parties for items of property, plant and equipment that were impaired, lost or given up are included in profit or loss when the compensation becomes receivable.
CellFormula_English: 'Compensation from third parties for items of property, plant and equipment that were impaired, lost or given up are included in profit or loss when the compensation becomes receivable.

CellValue_English: Derecognition
CellFormula_English: 'Derecognition

CellValue_English: The carrying amount of an item of property, plant and equipment is derecognised when the asset is disposed of or when when no future economic benefits are expected from its use or disposal. The gain or loss arising from the derecognition of an item of property, plant and equipment is included in profit or loss when the item is derecognised. Gains are classified as other gains on the face of the statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income.
CellFormula_English: 'The carrying amount of an item of property, plant and equipment is derecognised when the asset is disposed of or when when no future economic benefits are expected from its use or disposal. The gain or loss arising from the derecognition of an item of property, plant and equipment is included in profit or loss when the item is derecognised. Gains are classified as other gains on the face of the statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income.

CellValue_English: The cost of assets acquired through an exchange of assets is measured at fair value at acquisition date unless the exchange lacks commercial substance, or the fair value of neither the asset received nor the asset given up is reliably measurable. The acquired asset is immediately measured in this way even if the asset given up cannot immediately be derecognised. If the acquired asset is not measured at fair value, its cost is measured using the carrying amount of the asset given up.
CellFormula_English: 'The cost of assets acquired through an exchange of assets is measured at fair value at acquisition date unless the exchange lacks commercial substance, or the fair value of neither the asset received nor the asset given up is reliably measurable. The acquired asset is immediately measured in this way even if the asset given up cannot immediately be derecognised. If the acquired asset is not measured at fair value, its cost is measured using the carrying amount of the asset given up.

CellValue_English: Internally generated intangible assets are recognised initially at cost, being the sum of expenditure from the date the recognition criteria for an intangible asset are met, bearing in mind the following additional criteria:
